title: NH Hotel Group to sponsor 'Best Use of Technology Award' at EVCOM Live Awards
text:
NH Hotel Group to sponsor 'Best Use of Technology Award' at EVCOM Live Awards NH Hotel Group to sponsor 'Best Use of Technology Award' at EVCOM Live Awards Details Category: Awards   12:15 EVCOM has announced that NH Hotel Group are sponsoring a brand new category of the EVCOM Live Awards which take place on Friday 20th November at Olympia, London. NH Hotel Group is Europe's third-ranked business hotel chain and one of the top 25 worldwide. It operates close to 400 hotels with almost 60,000 rooms and 2,600 meeting rooms across its main city destinations in 29 markets across Europe, the Americas and Africa. 
NH is a leader in the business meeting and events segment with a key focus on providing its customers with innovative and sector-pioneering technology under its High Tech Made Easy service. This made the Group the perfect fit to sponsor this new award category. Rufino Pérez Fernández, Chief Commercial Officer at NH Hotel Group said: ““NH Hotel Group is proud to be associated with these important industry awards and, in particular, to sponsor the new Best Use of Technology award. At NH we recognise the importance of technology in delivering high impact and high performance meetings and events and are committed to providing our customers with the latest cutting-edge solutions, such as our 3D holographic projection technology and our telepresence and interactive collaboration systems.” EVCOM CEO Marco Forgione said, “The EVCOM Live Awards – previously The Eventia Awards – have historically been at the pinnacle of live and experiential recognition and we are delighted that a top international brand such as NH Hotels has come on board to sponsor an exciting new category. These awards go from strength to strength and with event agencies and venues both realising the potential of involvement we are justifiably incredibly excited about the inaugural “EVCOM Live Awards”.
